detail_desc: Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops with a foldable shaft and tongue in faux fur and lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Seam with pleats at the waist and short sleeves with narrow elastication and gathers. Unlined.
V-neck kaftan in woven fabric with airy sections and a slight sheen. Open at the sides with a button on each side, and fringing at the hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, reflective details and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with short raglan sleeves with gathers.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cotton chino shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable braided fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and buttons at the back. Mesh bodice covered in floral appliqués, a seam at the waist and a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Underskirt with a mesh flounce at the hem for added width. Lined.
Pyjama bottoms in soft satin with an elasticated drawstring waist, small frill trim at the top and wide, straight legs with lace-trimmed hems.

Blouse in a soft viscose weave. V-neck with a small frill trim, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum with a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Sleeveless top in a soft knit with a V-neck front and back and a roll-edge hem.

Fancy dress set with a unicorn Alice band and a pair of butterfly wings. Alice band with a glittery horn, glittery ears and flower appliqués. Wings with a glittery pattern, faux fur trim and elastic shoulder straps.
Platform shoes in imitation leather with a metallic surface, pointed toes and lacing at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 7.5 cm.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill. High waist with an extended waistband, zip fly, side and back pockets and straight, ankle-length legs with creases and wide turn-ups.
Shorts in a linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with metal eyelets at the front, a tie in a contrasting colour and contrasting colour ribbing at the neckline and cuffs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in an airy mulberry silk weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves and decorative seams at the sides.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie-detail hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Slightly longer hooded jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Hat and scarf set in soft rib-knit wool containing some cashmere. Hat with a turned-up hem. Size of scarf 27x170 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Unicorn-shaped slippers in soft faux fur with appliqués and embroidery. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft anti-slip soles.

Hat and matching mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, ear flaps and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Jersey lining. MIttens/fingerless gloves with a cable-knit section on the uppers and a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal fingerless gloves. Ribbed foldover cuffs.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette. For the matching jacket search on 0241590.
Sports bras in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh, and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Shirt in soft cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, a tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Lined.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with seams just below the knees.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, print motif on the front and dropped shoulders.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave. Low-cut back with a small frill trim and wide ties at the back. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a gathered seam under the bust for added width. Jersey lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal details and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and gently tapered, ankle-length legs.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and calf-length legs.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake flap pockets at the back.
Jumper in a light, fine, soft knit with long sleeves, raw edges and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short sleeves with an embroidered scalloped edge. Seam at the waist with pleats and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with elastication around the top and short sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist with a discreet drawstring at the sides, and seams with a small frill trim and concealed elastication around the skirt to create tiers. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg. Chest pocket with a glittery text print, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt, a fake fly with visible, decorative buttons, patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and collar that ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, long, wide sleeves and cuffs with a slit, covered buttons and flounce. Partly lined.
Top in supersoft pile with a wrapover, jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a gently rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Leather brogues with open laces, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, side stripes and wide, ribbed hems.
Top in soft jersey containing glittery threads with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbed trims.

Suit trousers in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. The trousers have a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in jersey made from organic cotton with an open chest pocket.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft fine knit made partly from recycled polyester. Wide ribbing at the top, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and a print motif down the legs.
Scarf in soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180 cm.

Glittery hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
